title: august 29: hurricane katrina slams into new orleans
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the day in history when Hurricane Katrina put 80% of New Orleans under water. After, Maia discusses the big events of the 2004 MTV Video Music Awards. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.

As we speak, Louisiana is reeling from Hurricane Ida, which hit on the 16th anniversary of Hurricane Katrina. You can help by visiting https://www.shreveportvolunteernetwork.com/, a local organization assisting those in need.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
